location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Edward Russell, Collector at Musulipatam [Machilipatnam] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a letter from George Moor, Civil Auditor at Fort St George, 18 January 1818, which in turn encloses an extract from a letter from the Court of Directors, regarding Jaffer Ali Khan's [Ja‘afar ‘Alī Khān] pension.Russell also requests occasional confirmation from the Resident that Jaffer Ali Khan is still alive.
